Info.Title: Bolt
Info.Writer: Dan Fogelman (screenplay by), Chris Williams (screenplay by)
Info.Actors: John Travolta, Miley Cyrus, Susie Essman, Mark Walton
Info.Plot: The canine star of a fictional sci-fi/action show that believes his powers are real embarks on a cross country trek to save his co-star from a threat he believes is just as real.
Info.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 30 nominations.
